CustomField.description: The number of days for which the contact counter is set up. For example, a 7 day contact period counts the number of contacts made with the borrower during the past 7 days.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of days for which the contact counter is set up. For example, a 7 day contact period counts the number of contacts made with the borrower during the past 7 days.
CustomField.label: Threshold Days
